item.title: Found Two Crazy Unrelated Issues At Time On BMW 535i
item.description: What happens when a car has two unrelated problems at the same time? This video documents the complex diagnostic process on a BMW 535i that had two surprising issues.

item.title: Dealer's BAD Engine "Diagnosis" Exposed! I Fixed This Impala for $200
item.description: A mechanic’s costly diagnosis for this Chevy Impala was wrong. I'll show you how a simple repair for only $200 saved me a ton of money and got the car running again.

item.title: Beware of These 6 Used Cars – Advice from a 20+ Year Mechanic!
item.description: Buying a used car? This guide from a mechanic reveals six popular models you should consider avoiding and the common, costly problems that make them a risk.

item.title: Three Shops Gave Up on Fixing This '16 Suburban?
item.description: What happens when a car is too difficult to fix? We’ll show you the full story of a 2016 Suburban that left three shops stumped and the expert diagnosis that finally solved the mystery.

item.title: If There's a Leak We Will Find it!
item.description: This video is all about troubleshooting. We'll show you how we track down a leak and what we do to get it fixed, once and for all.

item.title: This Car has Full Electric Power Steering!
item.description: Go inside this car with me to see a key piece of modern technology. This video breaks down how a full electric power steering system works and the advantages it offers over traditional systems.

item.description: Go inside a professional inspection of a Toyota MR2 Spider. We'll show you what it takes to service this unique car and discuss a few common issues you should know about.
